title: Southampton to sign Swedish youngster Rafael York?
content:
Southampton have looked into the possibility of signing Swedish teenager Rafael York, a report claims.

The 16-year-old, who is already a regular for Sandviken in Sweden's second division, is a transfer target for the Saints as well as a host of European clubs according to the Mirror.

The youngster, who could allegedly be signed for a maximum of £156,000, has played for Sweden u-15s and is currently part of the country's u-17 squad.

"When you see him play, you can't believe he is a 16-year-old. There is huge interest from half-a-dozen European clubs," his agent Michael Kallback told reporters.

Ronald Koeman's outfit take on Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday.
